info.name: Criminal
info.description: Criminal background from the Player’s Handbook 2024.
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Sleight of Hand and Stealth
Equipment: Choose A or B: (A) 2 Daggers, Thieves' Tools, Crowbar, 2 Pouches, Traveler's Clothes, 16 CP; or (B) 50 GP

description.p: You eked out a living in dark alleyways, cutting purses or burgling shops. Perhaps you were part of a small gang of like-minded wrongdoers who looked out for each other. Or maybe you were a lone wolf, fending for yourself against the local thieves' guild and more fearsome lawbreakers.

setters.set: Dexterity, Constitution, Intelligence, Alert Feat, Sleight of Hand and Stealth Skills, Thieves' Tools
